alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Collier, southeastern Hendry and western Palm Beach Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Hendry Correctional, or 19 miles east of Immokalee, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hendry Correctional and Big Cypress Seminole Reservation. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
